sim
Class DoubleDataParameter

java.lang.Object
  sim.Parameter
      sim.DoubleParameter
          sim.DoubleDataParameter

public class DoubleDataParameter
extends DoubleParameter

DoubleDataParameter extends DataParameter to implement functionality to display a DoubleParameter within a GUI. DoubleDataParameter contains a DataParamLine field which can be set using the setParamLine() method. The DataParamLine is used to display and update the parameter's value dynamically during running of the simulation using the DoubleDataParameter.

Version:
1 (03/11/2010)
Author:
Robin Smith

Constructor Detail

DoubleDataParameter

public DoubleDataParameter(java.lang.String name,
                           double value,
                           boolean isAdjustable)
Creates a DoubleDataParameter given a name, value and a boolean value to indicate whether or not the parameter is adjustable during running of the simulation using it.

Parameters:
name - the name for the parameter.
value - the value.
isAdjustable - true or false.
